title: 命令方块自定义交易时物品数字id下标怎么输入
author: miraker
txt_content:
比如·   /summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ 
{Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:3,Count:1},sell:{id:22,Count:1}},
{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:17,Count:64},sell:{id:14,Count:8}},
{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:17,Count:1},sell:{id:15,Count:12}},
{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:17,Count:1},sell:{id:56,Count:1}}]}}  我想把橡木id17 改为桦木17:2 怎么输入进命令方块啊

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
卅个屮 发表于 2015-5-25 12:03
id:17后面加damage:2试试
同志 d要大写。。。

replies.author: miraker
replies.txt_content:
卅个屮 发表于 2015-5-25 12:03
id:17后面加damage:2试试
测试过了 不行 用任何诸如： ； {} [] 连接符号都不行

replies.author: miraker
replies.txt_content:
chyx 发表于 2015-5-25 12:31
同志 d要大写。。。
能帮我从文本改一下么 万分感谢

replies.author: miraker
replies.txt_content:
miraker 发表于 2015-5-25 12:38
能帮我从文本改一下么 万分感谢
已解决 万分感谢啊 下面是修改文本
/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ 
{Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:3,Count:1},sell:{id:22,Count:1}},
{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:17,Damage:2,Count:64},sell:{id:14,Count:8}},
{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:17,Count:1},sell:{id:15,Count:12}},
{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:17,Count:1},sell:{id:56,Count:1}}]}}
